message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $100. It's a one-time offer, and you won't find a better deal anywhere else. If you buy it, you'll be getting a great value for your money, and I'm confident you'll be happy with your purchase.

However, I want to make it clear that this is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure if I'll be able to offer you another high-quality product at this price in the future.
